name: Lemon Meltaway cookies
steps: cream butter and sugar. then mix egg. stir in lemon zest
add 1/2 cup flour, baking powder, salt to butter until combined and then add rest of flour in 1/2 cup increments until you reach 2 cups
small cookie scoop to measure into balls and slightly flatten and add to cookie sheet lined with parchment paper
bake at 375 for 8-9 min. cookies will stay light in color. cool on pan for 2 min then transfer to cooling rack
make icing by whisking the powdered sugar with the lemon juice, salt, and cream until smooth
once cookies are cool, dip tops in the glaze
